wikipedia_page.main: Jack Stubbs (April 6, 1913 – February 2, 1997) was an American set decorator, who was born in Scotland. He was nominated for an Academy Award in the category Best Art Direction for the film Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing.

link_mentions.page: Academy Award for Best Production Design
response: | Walter M. Scott and Jack Stubbs
| Lyle R. Wheeler, George Davis, Walter M. Scott and Jack Stubbs
** Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing – Art Direction: Lyle R. Wheeler and George Davis; Set Decoration: Walter M. Scott and Jack Stubbs

* It was nominated for Best Actress in a Leading Role (Jennifer Jones), Best Art Direction-Set Decoration, Color (Lyle Wheeler, George Davis, Walter M. Scott, Jack Stubbs), Best Cinematography, Color, Best Picture and Best Sound, Recording.
